author: Susie Madrak
title: Politix Update: Bush V. Gore & The Tarnished Legacy Of Justice Sandra Day O'Connor
text:
sharethis 10/07/15 12:00pm Should Yogi Berra's long baseball career be judged by his error in a crucial 1951 game that deprived the New York Yankees' Allie Reynolds of a no-hitter against the Boston Red Sox? Or Dustin Hoffman's long film career by the 1987 cinematic bomb known as Ishtar? Of course not. But what about judging the long judicialâ€¦ Bush v.
